name: Hockey Island
description:
Play hockey against islands.

Features:
1. 16 different islands.
2. Amazing AI.
3. The great northern sport.

Single player vs AI, or 2 players on 1 keyboard.

This is a game I made for Ludum Dare #17. The theme was "Islands".

If the game feels unplayable, press ESC to get back to the menu and try using Honshu, Jamaica, Tasmania, or Sark. Some islands are poor at hockey.
